title: PC Restarts while playing Dark Star:Singularity
body: Hello i dould like to share a problem that happens lately.Last 2 times i played Dark Star:Singularity my PC forced shutdown after 2 rounds of the game.Happened in 3 games in a row.I dont know what is causing it i ve been monitoring my temps but i dont think thats the problem because i used overheat protection in my last game just to prevent the restart but the message never popped.Rly appreciate some help

replies.body: Thanks for the response.I wasnt able to finish the game while i was under overheat protection still forced shutdown.Fact is when i play normals with friends i have no problem.Didnt try yet in rankeds hope its just the Dark Star mode cauzing this .I ll keep an eye in temperatures then ill submit a ticket thanks again.

Hmmmmm you're on the right track by checking your pc temp! Typically, forced shutdown while gaming can be traced back to overheating. Your pc notices something is wrong that it can't fix, and they all have that feature built in to shut off before it can cause a house fire! You mentioned that you used overheat protection in the last game and the message never popped, does that mean you were able to play normally?

If you're still having your pc shut off randomly like that, I'd really suggest checking that temp a little closer to be sure if that's what is causing it. If so, hit our tech guys up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they may be able to help you figure something out to get you running smoothly again.
